document_data.name: ''Hath Kull''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Hath Kull''''' was a [[cursed]] [[longsword]] that could be found in the catacombs of [[Darkmoon|Temple Darkmoon]].
document_data.Description: The longsword functioned as a ''-2'' [[weapon]], making it more difficult to hit foes with.
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], the weapon and other enchanted items laid in a room deep beneath the [[evil]] temple known as Darkmoon. When removed from its location, a trap was sprung: the door slammed closed, and [[margoyle]]s assailed the victim.
